description:
Uh oh! Looks like the bull doesn't like Dot's cow-tipping game.  
Help Dot "steer" clear of this bully!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn on red lights. Then make Dot say "Whoa, catch me!" when Dot feels a shake.

hints.description: Drag out a Red light and a brave sound. Set the sound to "Whoa, catch me!" Link Start to the Red light using an Auto cue. Link the light to the sound using a Shake cue.

puzzles.description: After saying "Whoa, catch me!", make Dot wait for a random time up to 3.0 s then turn on yellow lights.

hints.description: Drag out a Yellow light. Link the sound to the Yellow light using a Random Wait cue. Set the cue time to 3.0 s.

puzzles.description: After turning on yellow lights, make Dot automatically play a cow sound. Then make Dot say "Nice one!" when Dot feels a slide left or slide right.
puzzles.introduction: When you hear the bull moo, it's time to mooove! Help Dot dodge the bull by sliding left or sliding right!

hints.description: Link the Yellow light to the Cow sound using an Auto cue. Link the Cow sound to the ""Nice one" sound using Slide Left and Slide Right cues.

puzzles.description: After dodging the bull, make Dot automatically turn on red lights again.

hints.description: Link the states with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the cow sound, make Dot wait for 2.0 s then turn the lights off and automatically play the Dizzy #1 sound. Then make Dot automatically turn on red lights.
puzzles.introduction: If Dot doesn't get out of the way in time, Dot might be knocked silly!

hints.description: Link the Cow sound to the Lights Off state using a Wait For cue set to 2.0 s. Use Auto cues to link the Dizzy #1 sound between the light states.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot dodge the bull three times.
puzzles.introduction:
Dot is getting pretty good at dodging that bull.  
Let's see how long Dot can keep going!
